description: This Pluggable Authentication Service (PAS) plugin will lock a                    login after a predetermined number of incorrect attempts. Once                    locked, the user will be shown a page that tells them to contact                    their administrator to unlock.
longdescription: This Pluggable Authentication Service (PAS) plugin will lock a                    login after a predetermined number of incorrect attempts. Once                    locked, the user will be shown a page that tells them to contact                    their administrator to unlock.
